abstract: The details of Amazon’s deal for Zappos.com, the online shoe seller, highlight the differences between how public and private acquisitions are negotiated, The Deal Professor says.
snippet: The details of Amazon’s deal for Zappos.com, the online shoe seller, highlight the differences between how public and private acquisitions are negotiated, The Deal Professor says.
lead_paragraph: Amazon.com’s recently announced $850 million acquisition of Zappos.com — the largest in Amazon’s history — highlights the differences between private and public transactions.

headline.main: Amazon and the Art of the Private Deal
